thread.title: Leaked: OnePlus Mini with 13MP camera to be launched soon
thread.title_full: Leaked: OnePlus Mini with 13MP camera to be launched soon

author: Deccan
title: Leaked: OnePlus Mini with 13MP camera to be launched soon
text:
Deccan Chronicle | September 29, 2015, 18.23 OnePlus Mini will likely run on Android 5.1.1 Lollipop operating system (Representational Image) OnePlus has received quite a good response from its fans with regards to the high-end OnePlus One and OnePlus 2 handsets. The tech giant hasn’t stopped at just this! Latest leaks reveal the name of its upcoming mysterious handset that is expected to launch soon.
(Image credit: AnTuTu via Weibo)
According to AnTuTu, the next handset will be named as ‘OnePlus Mini’ that will sport a 13MP rear camera. As per the listing on AnTuTu, the ‘OnePlus Mini’ will likely be powered by a MediaTek Helio X10 chipset loaded with 2.2 GHz processor.
Codenamed as ‘A2301’, this handset will offer 2GB of RAM and 32GB of in-built storage. OnePlus Mini will run on Android 5.1.1 Lollipop operating system. Media reports also state that the OnePlus Mini will likely fall in the budget category of phones.
